title: Golfer Rickie Fowler, fitness model Allison Stokke get married on the beach
text:
CLOSE

Almost three years ago to the day, Rickie Fowler went viral at the 2016 Ryder Cup at Hazeltine National Golf Club in Minnesota when he was the lone player without a significant other in a celebration photo after Team USA defeated the Europeans 17-11.

He then recreated the photo just months later on his annual spring break trip with Jordan Spieth, Justin Thomas and Smylie Kaufman.

It's safe to say Fowler won't be alone for many more photos after the 30-year-old tied the knot with girlfriend Allison Stokke last weekend on a beautiful beach.

Fowler began dating Stokke, a former pole vaulter at Cal and current fitness model, in 2017. The couple became engaged in June 2018.
description: Rickie Fowler began dating Allison Stokke, a former pole vaulter at Cal and current fitness model, in 2017. The couple became engaged in June 2018.
